data: Experienced programmer with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry.
I use TypeScript, React and Redux in development. Understand CI/CD, unit testing and code review processes as well.
Also familiar with Back-End development (Java, Node JS). Advanced Linux user.
I have considerable experience with various roles as team lead, integrator, developer.
Also skilled in usage of version control systems such as Git or Mercurial and task trackers like Jira.
Strong engineering professional with a Engineer's degree focused in Applied Informatics in Economics from Rybinsk State Aviation Technological Academy named after P. A. Solovyov.
I live in Rybinsk, a small city on the banks of river Volga. The city is located in 300 kilometers northeast of Moscow.
I'm interested in adventures and fantasy books and movies. Fond of music of different genres such as Rock, Jazz and Blues.
Amateur sportsman playing Soccer and Basketball. Also like cycling and swimming.
